adrFormatAddress: 210 5th Ave 10th floor, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: I moved from Boston (where the real estate world is completely different). They took the time to sit me down, explain everything, get a sense for what was important to me, and then proceeded to take me to multiple different areas and locations until I found the right apartment. Always punctual, upbeat, and highly organized. I have already recommended to a few friends moving here. Will absolutely be working with Mercer on all things real estate from this point on. Thank you to Marlon and his team for such a pleasant experience!

originalText.text: This recommendation is for Alex of Mercer Real Estate. Alex went above and beyond to locate my new apt in NYC. I was relocating from San Francisco and did not know anything about New York City Real Estate. Alex made the process super easy and broke down every step of the process. After a few days we closed on a perfect unit close to my office so I could walk to and from work. I have already recommend two of my friends who are moving across the country to use Alex !

originalText.text: Marlon is simply amazing! He is so helpful and good at what he does. I felt so lucky to be in his hands. He found me my DREAM apartment and the process couldn’t have gone smoother. He is diligent, hardworking, and kind!

text.text: Marlon is simply amazing! He is so helpful and good at what he does. I felt so lucky to be in his hands. He found me my DREAM apartment and the process couldn’t have gone smoother. He is diligent, hardworking, and kind!

originalText.text:
Without a doubt, this is the best real estate agency I've ever dealt with in any city. Trying to plan a cross country move to NYC comes with enough stress, but Idan was just the best. He answered my endless emails within my minutes and arranged viewings over one weekend on a tight timeline.

Once in New York, Idan and Tal took us all over trying to find the perfect place. They were both extremely knowledgeable, professional, friendly and fun -- not too mention great negotiators who helped us get exactly what we wanted at a fair price. They were also just fun to be around! I would not hesitate to recommend either Idan or Tal to anyone, and I will most definitely been working with them again in the future.

text.text:

Once in New York, Idan and Tal took us all over trying to find the perfect place. They were also just fun to be around! I would not hesitate to recommend either Idan or Tal to anyone, and I will most definitely been working with them again in the future.

originalText.text: Thank you Marlon 5 Stars!!!! DO NOT HESITATE TO REACH OUT TO MARLON. He locked down my apartment within one day in Midtown West in a great luxury building that had every single amenity I was looking for (doorman, gym, laundry in unit) within my budget. Thanks again!!
